attributes.action: change the laws on homophobia in schools and society to be taken as seriously as racism.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Racism is a hate crime. But so is homophobia. Yet very little is done in schools and society in the modern day and age to prevent bullying and isolation of people who are openly homosexual. I create this petition to raise awareness and also to encourage the Government to take homophobia as seriously as racism.
